title: Iterable to Hash
description: In this lab, we will explore the Iterable to Hash method in JavaScript. This method allows us to convert a given iterable (object or array) into a value hash, which can be useful for organizing and accessing data in a more efficient way. We will learn how to use Object.values() and Array.prototype.reduce() to create an object that is keyed by the reference value of the iterable.

meta.title: Convert Iterable to Hash in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to convert an iterable (object or array) into a value hash in JavaScript using Object.values() and Array.prototype.reduce().
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, object, iterable, javascript lab, javascript tutor, array, hash

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 可迭代对象转哈希
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索JavaScript中的可迭代对象转哈希方法。此方法可让我们将给定的可迭代对象（对象或数组）转换为值哈希，这对于以更高效的方式组织和访问数据很有用。我们将学习如何使用Object.values()和Array.prototype.reduce()来创建一个以可迭代对象的引用值作为键的对象。

meta.title: 在JavaScript中把可迭代对象转换为哈希
meta.description: 学习如何在JavaScript中使用Object.values()和Array.prototype.reduce()将可迭代对象（对象或数组）转换为值哈希。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript练习, 在线JavaScript练习, 对象, 可迭代对象, JavaScript实验, JavaScript教程, 数组, 哈希

verify.name: 验证Node命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH中，通过输入'node'并按下回车键即可运行JavaScript。
